titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2924) to guarantee the timely payment of social security benefits in March 1996.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-460, by Mr. Goss.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2924 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Providing for the consideration of the bill in the House. Motion to recommit may include instructions only if offered by the Minority Leader or his designee.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 183.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 229 - 178 (Roll no. 28).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/1/1996--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2924 (payment of social security benefits in March 1996).
